title: nice

text:
Ini adalah pertama kali saya terniat review hotel. Saya menginap 5 Jan 2021. Hotel ini Bintang 4 dengan rate 8,3/10 di Traveloka. Saya dapat kamar pertama di 517, saat itu juga saya minta untuk pindah kamar, karna kamar sangat tidak sesuai, kondisinya buruk dikelasnya. 

Kemudian saya menunggu di lobby untuk pergantian kamar, karena resepsionis  makesure kamarnya tidak saya duduki. Ok.

Kemudian saya diberikan kamar 521 atau 520 (saya lupa), saya  makesure ke resepsionis, sofa bersih? Kamar tidak dipaksa twin bed jadi king bed dengan komposisi aneh? Resepsionis menjawab semua sudah mereka bersihkan dan sesuai standart hotel ini.

Saya naik ke kamar, dan kondisi sama buruknya. Tempat tidur terlihat tidak beraturan komposisinya, handuk lebih layak untuk hotel bintang 2, sofa penuh bercak, atap shower bolong karna jamur, dll. Saya rasa, saya tidak akan bisa tidur disini. Saya kembali ke bawah, dan memilih chek out, karena merasa pihak hotel tidak terlalu perduli dengan komplain saya. Semua keluhan saya sampaikan kepada Pak Ryan selaku Manager Hotel. Awalnya beliau bersikeras bahwa semua sudah sesuai, dan kamar mereka baik2 saja. Saya sodorkan foto2 kondisi kamar, dan saya ajukan pertanyaan bagaimana bisa hotel bintang 4 seperti ini?
Serta saya sampaikan akan check out dan pesan di hotel lain, dari sinilah beliau baru menawarkan upgrade kamar "Saya upgrade pun ibu ga mau ya? Karna sudah akan check out?". Kenapa Anda baru menawarkan upgrade setelah tau saya pesan hotel lain? 

Keluhan ini saya sampaikan juga ke pihak Traveloka, dan Traveloka hanya sampai/berpeganggan pada penjelasan Pihak Hotel. Karena keluhan saya tidak dibalas lanjut oleh Traveloka dan terhapus. Sungguh kerjasama yang baik kalian sebagai pihak kedua dan ketiga. Tanpa memperdulikan customer dan hanya meraup uang Customer saja.

Hal-hal yang membuat nyaman:
- kamar besar (tipe deluxe)
- petugas ramah (sering menyapa)
- satpam hotel membantu saya dan anak2 untuk menyebrang jalan
- suhu kamar bisa diatur sehingga tidak terlalu dingin
- disediakan handuk kecil

beberapa hal yang membuat kurang nyaman:

- kran untuk mengaktifkan shower kamar mandi bocor
- kolam renang berdekatan dengan ruang yg bisa dijadikan ruang meeting. Ada rasa tidak enak saat sedang menunggu anak2 berenang dan di belakang saya sekumpulan orang sedang meeting.

text:
Saya mendapatkan pengalaman menginap di hotel Amaroossa Cosmo selama 3 hari. Kebetulan ada gathering bersama teman-teman sesama pebisnis online di daerah Jakarta Selatan dan mendapati hotel ini punya review yang bagus secara online. Saya memilih kamar tipe Deluxe Room dengan sarapan dan mendapatkan kamar di lantai 7.

Saya setuju hotel ini bagus dan fasilitas kamarnya lengkap. Ada termos pemanas air, hair dryer, kulkas, brankas, tv layar datar, dsj yang biasa ditemukan di hotel bintang empat namun yang cukup surprise ternyata di dalam lemari ada setrika sekaligus meja lipatnya. Pengalaman saya menginap di hotel memang tidak terlalu banyak, tapi setidaknya tidak terlalu jarang pula dan baru pertama kali ini saya mendapatkan fasilitas setrika dalam kamar :).

Yang paling saya suka nilai dari hotel adalah variasi makanan saat sarapan, karena saya pecinta kuliner. Nah untuk sarapan di hotel Amaroossa Cosmo ini cukup memuaskan karena variasinya cukup banyak dan kelompok makanan beratnya selalu diganti menunya tiap hari. Untuk makanan/minuman yang selalu ada setiap hari di antaranya beberapa pilihan roti, yoghurt, pilihan masakan telur, sosis, dan bubur ayam. Menu makanan berat yang selalu diganti setiap harinya adalah jenis masakan ayam dan nasi goreng.

Yang menjadi kekurangan hotel ini dan memang sudah dibahas beberapa reviewer lain adalah kecepatan wifinya. Saat saya melakukan speedtest, kecepatannya bahkan tidak mencapai 1Mbps. Menurut saya, kecepatan internet zaman sekarang minimal 1Mbps baru terasa nyaman dan 2Mbps pun sebenarnya sudah standar jadi untuk management mohon hal ini diperhatikan.

Kekurangan lainnya tidak berhubungan langsung dengan hotel sih yaitu minim fasilitas di lokasi sekitar. Tidak ada ATM dan Minimarket yang bisa dibilang dekat. Ada ATM BRI tapi kita harus jalan agak jauh +/- 1 KM dan minimarket juga sama jauhnya. Kalau boleh saran sih pihak hotel membeli lisensi franchise minimarket, selain untuk pengunjung hotel agar tidak kesulitan membeli suatu kebutuhan saya juga yakin warga di sekitar wilayah hotel akan terbantu dan membeli disana juga. Jadi, win-win solution.

Secara keseluruhan sih hotel ini nyaman dan cukup memuaskan. Andaikata kedua kekurangan tadi bisa diatasi, maka akan mendekati sempurna. Overall, recommended hotel to stay :)
title: Hotel bagus, minus kecepatan wifi dan fasilitas lokasi sekitar

text:
Baru kali ini ngasih review yang super niat banget. Bahkan saya masih ada di lobby untuk nulis ini.
Bagusnya adalah... harga yg terjangkau dengan kamar yang sangat bagus.

Buruknya adalah:
1. kamar berisik sekali karena dekat lift barang dan sangat mengganggu tidur.
2. FOGGING TENGAH MALAM

Oke, perihal nomor 1 masih bs saya maklumi. Tapi fogging tengah malam itu sangat fatal bagi saya. Tengah malam bangun karena mencium bau minyak tanah. Nyalain lampu dan lihat kalau kamar dipenuhi asap (serius, saya kira kebakaran). Saya sampai keluar kamar dan tlf operator untuk mastiin ga ada kebakaran. Ternyata jeng jeng..... baru aja dilakukan fogging. Asap memenuhi kamar saya, dan bikin saya sesak nafas. Sampai saya memulis review ini saya masih sesak nafas.

well, UNTUNGNYA masih bisa pindah kamar di jam 3 pagi. Ditambah staff hotel yg sangat membantu.

Kepada Yth Syanad

Salam hangat dari Cosmo AMAROOSSA Jakarta,

Merupakan suatu kehormatan kami mengetahui kegiatan rapat Bapak beberapa kali diadakan di Cosmo AMAROOSSA Jakarta yang berkesan megah dan elegan.
Memang kami akui bahwa parkir kendaraan bermotor memang sangat terbatas, namun telah kami antisipasi dengan mendapatkan tempat parkir disisi lain dari hotel.
Kami berharap Cosmo AMAROOSSA Jakarta tetap menjadi hotel pilihan Bapak dan perusahaan mengadakan pertemuan di kemudian hari.
Kami siap memberikan pelayanan terbaik kami , kami tunggu kedatangan Bapak dan perusahaan kembali di Cosmo AMAROOSSA Jakarta.
Terimakasih
Hormat kami
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Kesan pertama hotel ini sangat hitam, maksud saya interior hotelnya bernuansa hitam :D, kesan nya sangat mewah, ya sampai wallpaper di depan lift nya memakai kulit motif buaya, chandelier kristal yg menjuntai sampai ke lantai di depan restaurant (kayanya yg beli lupa ngukur berapa panjangnya jadi kelebihan :D), lorong kamar dengan wallpaper motif warna coklat & karpet tebal warna merah, pelayanan yg ramah & penampilan staf profesional. First impression yg saya dapat: Glamour! 

Masuk ke kamar, very hot! Selain lupa menghidupkan AC, itu nuansa yg saya dapat dari karpet merah di lantai, cermin2 di dindingnya & tembok shower yg berupa kaca bening! Jadi siapapun yg mandi bakal kelihatan dari samping bed (coba nginap bareng Jupe nih *mimisan), tapi jangan khawatir ada tirai untuk jaga privasi. Ada TV ukuran besar, sayangnya belum full HD & beberapa channel tidak jelas.

Ada timbangan di bawah wastafel nya, buat yg lagi diet mereka akan melihat benda ini sama kaya resep dokter, gunakan 3x sehari sesudah makan, LOL. Nice add in.
Shower head besar, tapi pancaran air nya kurang kuat nih, ah.. sayang sekali.

Buka lemari pakaian untuk nyimpan baju, ada benda yg membuat saya tersenyum, ada setrika lengkap dengan papan setrikaannya di sana! Ini dia benda yg  menjawab keluhan saya selama ini, kemeja2 saya yg kusut waktu di packing, wah hotelnya benar2 perhatian ini. Coba di dalam lemarinya juga dilengkapi mbak2 yg siap bantu mensetrika baju saya ya, ha..ha.. *minta digampar manajemen hotel.

Sarapan adalah 1 hal yg saya tunggu2 tiap pagi, dan sarapan di hotel ini sangat menyenangkan. Masakan di hotel ini bukan 4*, tapi layak untuk diberi 5*. Banyak pilihan makanan, traditional, western. Biasanya cheft hotel sangat ngirit bumbu2, jadi rasa makanannya hambar, tapi tidak di hotel ini. Amazing taste! Kursi restaurant membuat saya betah duduk berlama2. Saya jadi paham kenapa ada timbangan berat badan di kamar. I can't stop tasting the food! 

Hanya satu hal yg saya sayangkan dari hotel ini, lokasinya. Jauh dari keramaian, tidak ada toko, tempat belanja, mini mart... Hanya bengkel mobil di depan hotel, feel too quiet padahal saya berada di Jakarta ya.
title: Glamour yet quiet hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Waeke2008

Salam hangat dari Cosmo AMAROOSSA Jakarta

Kami sangat berterimakasih anda telah meluangkan waktu untuk memberikan komentar dan input mengenai kuallitas service dan produk kami, yang sangat berguna bagi kami untuk selalu memberikan yang terbaik bagi tamu kami.
Kami mencoba untuk memberikan sesuatu image mengenai hotel kami baik dari sisi interior, eksterior serta melengkapi produk kami yang berbeda dari hotel lain.

Kami harap anda dapat kembali tinggal bersama kami diwaktu mendatang pada saat melakukan perjalanan bisnis ataupun leisure di jakarta.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Hotel ini dirancang dengan konsep butik. Saya pernah menginap di hotel amaroossa Bandung, dan dibandingkan dengan hotel yang berlokasi di Jakarta ini, konsepnya juga relative sama dan rasanya lebih cocok untuk menginap dengan tujuan bisnis. Hal ini terlihat dari lokasinya yang berada di tengah kota, dengan kepadatan lalu lintas yang cukup macet baik pagi dan sore harinya. Fasilitas pool juga terkesan ala kadarnya. 
Saya mengadakan meeting di tempat ini. Menu lunch tidak terlalu banyak variasinya. Begitu juga toilet di area meeting tidak selalu dibersihkan sehingga wastafel terlihat basah,.
title: Hotel butik di area yang cukup macet

text:
Menginap di hotel ini lumayan tenang, tidak terdengar suara-suara la lintas kendaraan di luar walaupun hotel ini terletak tepat di samping Fly over.
Kamar di hotel ini lumayan luas dengan desain yang menarik. Sayangnya kualitas pekerjaan interior dan furnitur hotel ini agak kurang baik sehingga ada beberapa barang yang sudah agak rusak dan mau terlepas, misalnya sandaran tempat tidur di kamar yang saya tempati.
Menu makanan di hotel ini lumayan beragam dibandingkan hotel bintang 4 lainnya. Terus terang saya lumayan berselera makan di sini dibandingkan sewaktu menginap di hotel lain.
Akan tetapi sepertinya kapasitas ruang makan utama agak kurang, sehingga pada saat tamu makan berbarengan ada tamu yang tidak kebagian tempat duduk.
Selebihnya, pelayanan di hotel ini cukup baik dan bagus.
Recommended.
title: Hotel Boutique yang sesuai untuk Meeting

text: Enaknya di Amaroossa, semua staf selalu siap dan ramah melayani permintaan anda..serasa tinggal di hotel sendiri... hehehe dan makanan di restaurantnya pun memanjakan lidah kita ... lokasinya pun lumayan dekat dengan mall yang ok.
title: Excellent services

text: Hotel ini relatif baru namun laris sebagai tempat meeting. Keseluruhan hotel dan kamar didesain dengan konsep boutique yang elegan dan klasik. Ruang meeting yang tersedia cukup banyak, hanya menurut saya konsep penamaan ruang meeting kurang jelas. Menu makanan, untuk hotel bintang 4, mungkin agak kurang dalam variasi, namun rasanya enak (sambil menulis ini saya terngiang-ngiang nasi gorengnya). Selain kopi dan teh untuk minuman snack meeting, terdapat pula complementary jus buah
title: Hotel boutique pilihan untuk meeting

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Salah satu kelebihan dari hotel ini adalah desain kamarnya yang luas dan menarik namun dengan harga yang cukup terjangkau kalau tidak bisa dibilang murah untuk ukuran hotel bintang 4 di Jakarta. Saya mendapatkan kamar suite room dengan ukuran yang cukup luas (jarang-jarang saya dapat kamar luas untuk hotel di Jakarta) di mana fasilitas hotel ini pun cukup lengkap ada lounge, ada kolam renang di mana disediakan live music dan restoran untuk sarapan atau pun makan malam. Cuma 1 hal yang mengganjal saya selama menginap di sana adalah layanan laundry yang lambat (mungkin karena outsource ke luar piha hotel) dan menu makanan dan service di tempat sarapan yang menurut saya kurang sesuai standard hotel bintang 4 (menikmati sarapan di mana lalat berseliweran). Overall hotel ini cukup baik untuk ditempati namun saran sy kepada pihak hotel agar pelayananya lebih ditingkatkan agar customer satisfaction terjaga.
title: Hotel Desain Menarik

text: untuk acara2 meeting dalam jumlah diatas 100 org cocok pake ballroom disini. selain tanpa gangguan pilar penyangga, ceiling nya juga tinggi, karpetnya masih baru dengan motif yg tak biasa, lampu kristalnya serasi menjuntai di tengah ruangan. secara keseluruhan ballroonya cantik, saya rasa cocok juga utk wedding. sound sistem sudah built in di ceiling dan belakang ruangana. perlu disiapkan kabel extention utk pembicara yg mandiri. oya menunya jg enak :D
title: ballroomnya cantik

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Kami tidak memiliki niat untuk menginap di hotel ini namun, pada saat saya, suami dan anak-anak kecapean setelah seharian mengunjungi keluarga kami melewati hotel ini dan memutuskan untuk tinggal selama 1 malam namun berubah menjadi 2 malam.
Kami tinggal di kamar suite nya terletak di lantai 8 dengan pemandangan yang cukup luas sehigga dari jendela kamar saya dapat menyaksikan indahnya 'sunset' di selatan kota Jakarta.
Kami memesan room service dengan menu 'Sop Buntut' dan Norwegian Grilled Salmon yang rasanya enak, staff room servicenya juga ramah, pada saat saya memberikan tip staff tersebut menolak dengan halus.
Breakfast di hotel ini merupakan pengalaman yang tidak terlupakan, mulai dari Asia Food, sampai dengan tradisional food yang sudah lama tdk saya jumpai seperti ikan asin peda dan jambal dengan sambal terasinya yang enak, dan suami lebih menyukai untuk menyantap habis dimsum nya, karyawan restaurannya juga sangat ramah ramah dan sangat membantu terutama pada saat sandal anak saya copot lem nya langsung menghubungi pihak engineering untuk membantu memberikan lem sandal anak saya.
Handuk hotelnya wangi dan lembut, kebersihan kamar sangat terjaga.
Pada saat saya memerlukan taxi dan cukup lama mendapatkannya, pihak Guest Relation Officer menawarkan mobil hotel dengan harga yang sama dengan biaya taxinya sehingga perjalanan saya menuju ancol jadi nyaman dengan kendaraan hotel.
Kami sekeluarga memutuskan akan kembali menginap di hotel yang mengesankan ini
title: Hotel yang indah dengan pelayanan yang memuaskan

text:
It probably was a luxury hotel years ago, but those times are definitely long gone. When entering the hotel, it is obvious that in order to claim “luxury”, it requires urgent upgrading & improvement. 
Besides this, you’ve the highway in front of the hotel and if you’re on a higher floor, it feels as if this highway literally goes through your bedroom. 
The pictures from the swimming pool must have been made from one of the best photographers in town, because there is a huge difference from what you see on the advertisements and when you physically stand in front of the pool
title: A hotel in its age

text: Stayed for 3 nights and the room is big enough to accommodate 3 pax with breakfast, Spacious room though i feel the interior too dark, clean and free wi-fi. Breakfast has a rather small range but good enough and the overall taste is good. Nothing fancy but wholesome for family especially if you have children as they are family-oriented. Swimming pool is small but good for children and adult for dipping only. I did not try the fitness nor the massage/spa. Staff friendly and some can speak English so overall the stay is comfortable.
title: Decently good

text:
The hotel is strategically located in South Jakarta with close access to toll gate heading West and East of Jakarta. This is more a business hotel as the surrounding area has no nearby restaurants or shops. The hotel facilities are just fine.
The room is spacious but very dark as the furniture is dark and the carpet is dark red as well. Restaurant serves good variety for breakfast but I experienced 2 times cold food. The staff was very helpful and friendly.
title: Just ok hotel in South Jakarta

text:
I stayed at this hotel 2 nigts in January 2016. 
Good things:
Quick check in, receptionist borrow me money to pay taxi bill, bell boy was very helpfull.

Not good:
1. Elevator is to all i think. It was so noisy when the door closing or opening. You should ask legal inspector to inspect it yearly.
2. The noise from room beside was heard very clear in my room. They were laughing and chit chating. I cannot sleep bcoz of that. I asked reception to call them to be quite, then i waited, it was still noisy, i didnt hear any phone ringing. Then i checked it to reception and they said they already called, liar.... I said dont lie to me... Call now after my call. Then i listened phone was ringing, then those noise gone. You have to controll all of your guest, not to disurb other guest, evenmore when your rooms wall is bad.
3. I didnt find any fruit in the first day breakfast. In the 2nd day i found cockroach on the spoon at fruit table. Yaccchhhhh....
4. You have to pay if you lost your keycard. They didnt tell me when i checked in, but they directly claimed me to pay when i came back to pick up my stuffs. Fortunately i found my card, after checking back my bag and wallet. 
5. Security angried to my taxi driver when the driver took exit way to get in. Man, you dont need to angry, just remind us kindly. 

I hope management will take quick action for elevator and rooms wall cases...

text:
This hotel is to the south of Jakarta, so well away from the bustle of the centre of the city.  The hotel is promoted as a boutique establishment, so has unusual decor.  There is a small splash pool if you need to cool off.

Points to like;

The room was well appointed with iron and solid wifi.  Slightly bizarre clear glass bathroom arrangement with curtain - fine if you are travelling by yourself but a bit strange with company!

The breakfast was comprehensive with a good buffet selection.

Staff were friendly and attentive.

Not so sure

The dark decor in the corridor is not to everyone's taste.

Did not like

The rooms locks work on a proximity key and you have to lift the handle, not push down, so this is pretty confusing and caused an initial trip back downstairs in the lift, which have touch sensitive buttons, so do not respond like a normal push button - you need to be sure to use the pad of your finger to register your touch!

My room was at the front, which has an elevated major arterial route in addition to the old road at ground level.  This makes rooms to the front noisy, despite the double glazing.
title: High Tech is not Always the Best

text: This hotel is nestled in the middle of Jakarta.  And although it is in the center of the city the sounds of traffic and bustle of city life are not heard in the hotel walls. The staff is friendly and accommodating always willing to answer any questions you may have.  The complimentary breakfast buffet is not to be missed. Their omelet is fantastic as well as their selection of local cuisine. Make sure to try the bubur ayam ( chicken porridge) and dim sum. The only complaint that I have is  smoking rooms are next door to non-smoking rooms. I enjoyed my stay. And would return if given the opportunity.

text:
Had a nice deal by booking through hotel quickly apps and decided to stay here for a night. 

The parking space was limited but they provided valet service so i didnt find it as a problem.

The check in and out process was fast and efficient. Staffs are friendly and helpful.

The corridor was indeed a bit dark but i didnt even see it as a problem, again. Room was quite spacious with lots of mirrors. The design was nice and comfortable with a dim lighting. As i stayed here only for a good sleep, i thought this is really suitable. But maybe if you wanted to do some work, it would be a bit dark.

The bed and also double pillows were big and comfortable. Bathroom were clean with complete amenities. There were also iron and hot water machine. They also provided a small refrigerator. Everything works well of course.

Location was near Kemang and Simatupang. it only took 15 mins to reach my office at SCBD area. 

All in all, My stay was overall great and comfortable. This hotel had everything we need for a homey stay and i didnt even encounter into any problems during my stay.
title: Nice stay

text:
The hotel is close to/within the Kemang area and probably had a nice location some year back but nowadays, you’ve the main road in front of the hotel, plus the elevated highway on top of it. Depending which room you’ve it could be quite noisy.
The hotel claims to be a boutique hotel, be assured it’s far away from that. The rooms, although everything worked fine, are averagely furnished. Using the bathroom towels as indicator: I assume some years ago they where white, but nowadays they are all gray. 
The “so-called” swimming pool on the ground floor is a bit bigger then a Jacuzzi, next to the main road and basically covered by the 1st floor on top of it.
Breakfast area is OK, the wifi system within the hotel is FOC and rather stable and faster then in other hotels. The staff is very friendly and helpful. 
In summary: it’s a good but small business hotel. If your area of operation is around Kemang then OK, otherwise traffic is a nightmare. Acceptable value for money
title: An average hotel that requires some upgrading

text:
We stayed in this hotel for a night during business trip to Jakarta. Overall it's a very good hotel to stay in, it covers basic needs such as clean bathroom, comfortable bedding, fine amenities, and delicious breakfast. The room is spacious, modern, and beautiful, I love the red plush carpet and couch by the window. However black is not my favorite color for bed stuff and bathroom wall, but it's just a matter of personal preference, some might find it unique and elegant. Traffic noises is unavoidable since the hotel is located on very busy road and there's elevated highway nearby, but I guess we can't expect solace and tranquillity in Jakarta. We didn't find major trouble during our stay unless the room telephone that didn't work properly.
I might return to Cosmo Amaroossa for next visit to Jakarta; and if the hotel's manager read this review, I hope the will pass my gratitude to the pâtissier who made the those delicious cake/puddings for breakfast, and to the security officers who were very friendly and helpful.
title: Very Good Hotel, Well Priced and Satisfying

text:
I booked this hotel as we were in Jakarta for a business trip and we wanted to stay in the Kemang area to be near our meeting places knowing how bad traffic can plaque Jakarta. The hotel fronts a major road which also has an additional elevated highway so traffic noise is something you have to live with. You can try to get rooms facing the back if you are particularly sensitive. While being in Kemang, you will still need to travel by taxi to get to the shopping and restaurants area as walking is not conducive.

The hotel is fairly new and provide decent enough free WiFi. Some areas to improve include the website services, I could not make a booking via their website and ended up paying more for the room than originally advertised but to compensate they gave my colleagues and I room upgrades. Parking is very limited and cars often block the access.
title: Decent enough for 2 nights

text:
The hotel is quite new, only 4 months old if I am not mistaken when I spent a night . It has spacious room with unique bathroom. 

The hotel did not have large parking space. Possibly it was intended for the business person that does not drive their own vehicle.

The swimming pool was not spacious but it's enough for people that need to do exercise before taking a good sleep.

The hotel is located near the SOS International Clinic, this hotel is the right place before taking the Medical Check Up for person that live outside Jakarta and need to take OGUK Medical Check Up at SOS International Clinic. It's only at walking distance from the clinic.

It was unfortunate for me not to taste the food due to I was arrive after the dinner time and I have to do fasting before OGUK Medical Check Up the next day.
title: A place to relax before MCU

text:
1. Rooms spacious, 
2. Breakfast buffet was delicious, with good variety, 
3. Location is pretty good, with easy access to a few malls & eatery
My wife and I stayed 2 nights in the Executive Room before we embarked on fulfilling the 5th pillar of Islam which is Hajj. 
The room is very spacious and the decor was modern and elegant.
As a devout Muslim, I found that the Mushollah next door was very convenient. 
The staff were friendly and helpful. 
The breakfast buffet was probably one of the highlights of our stay, as there are good variety of food to choose from, traditional indonesian food.
All in all, My wife and I were pleased with our stay. The spacious rooms, delicious food and the great value for money.

Once again thank you to Amoroossa for the great Hospitality and Service that you have provided us during our stay. We will definitely come back again and will refer our friends and family to your Hotel.

Regards,
Haris Thahar
title: Spaciou Rooms & well presented. Delicious Food

King Size Bed in Executive Room

text:
I was staying at this hotel on Feb 9 at room 618. Check in was fast and service was OK. When i got in the room, there was this annoying sound came from the clock, i unplugged the thing right away :-).

I'm not a fan of the room interior cuz it's rather dark. But the bed and pillows were totally comfy. Loved the daybed next to the bed. Amenities were good, toiletries in the bathroom were nice and complete. Big screen LED plasma and wifi connection was excellent. The only complaint i had was the size of hanging lamp above the bedside table, it's too big i bumped my head on it twice!. 

I had a room service and ordered dinner. The service i had from the server named Dafa was good. 

Breakfast was good. The selections of int'l and local delicacies were quite satisfying. The only negative was the restaurant staff. None of them came to my table and offered me tea or hot coffee, unlike in any other hotel. No big deal but perhaps it would make a positive impression. 

Overall, my short stay with Amaroossa was just cool! I'd come back!
title: 1 night experience

text:
A newly open and nice business hotel with decent rates. The interior design is modern and clean, although nothing fantastic (why do all hotel designers do the same thing; and why do all hotel managers setup their properties exactly the same?!).

I only stayed there 1 night so I could not test the environment policy (it was displayed and said that bedsheets and towels would only be changed if I requested that. We all know now that this usually does not happen because of lack of training of the cleaning staff). 

My check-out was a bit disturbing. Instead of being asked if I had consumed something from the minibar, I was aksed to wait for at least 5 minutes until someone checked my room. That was not a very pleasant feel, especially when the front desk staff said to her colleague "cleared" referring to me {not taking anything from the minibar or stilling something from the room). I felt quite awkward

Buffet breakfast was good as was the buffet dinner at a reasonable price. Staff very professional. Not near to anything, but also not far from Kemang and various malls, restaurants and bars. All in all a very pleasant stay..If I had any criticism it would only be that they did not have a great selection of beer in the bar (And only the Zero variety of cola)..and the bar was a bit pricey...but there was live entertainment..all in all good hotel, good service, good price.

text:
This is the third time my partner and I have stayed here.
It's walking distance from 2 malls and the Kemang entertainment area.
Taxis are plentiful and cheap anyway 
The rooms are well appointed especially the suites,some more cable tv selections would be nice.
The staff are very good,especially the cleaning staff,although occasionally a small misunderstanding in my English my happen.
The breakfast buffet is of high quality,gets a tick of approval from my Indo partner,says its just the way her mum cooks,she recommends the dim sum.There is a small selection of western food ,omelettes are very good.The Indo food is excellent and the staff at breakfast are superb.
The biggest downer is the coffee sucks,very average at the best.
There is a small area out the front to park your car and the swimming pool is tiny.
So if you want to stay near the Kemang or Cipete Raya area you should look no further than here.
Thoroughly recommended
title: Great value and nice place to stay

text:
Size, price, quality of the room is fine... appropriate for its price tag. Their publish rate for the suite room was IDR 2.800 K but if you are using Mandiri Debit/Credit card you'll get a 60% discount off and leaving you paying only IDR 960 K - neat. Try some other website selling voucher for other discount.

The room is spacious with a tube & shower separated with the toilet - the room was in the corner so you get a full window of sunshine in the morning - lovely sun - not so lovely view since it only can see the road and residential area. The breakfast was just ok - egg station with self service - the egg are cold and nobody cares - there is seem to be 2 cook just hanging around in soto station... no coffee offering or even how to use the coffee machine (just incase the guest didn't know how to use it)... 

It is a good hotel with so so so so so average maintenance ... when I got here I got my room quick, it's a suite room with no refridge - no towel - not cool/cold air conditioner and the tv has no channel... when I complained - they brought me this small refridge and put it there... ofcourse its not cold as refridge should be... minibar empty (literally empty - yet at the front office while I checked out,. they ask me if I consume anything...). 

The tv channel I think I the worst part... zero tv channel... finally they change my room to the other suite at the other end of the building. Better - this time there 3 bellboy/maintenance guy to check the room for the fridge, tv and air cond... but again they forget my towel.
When I ask they deliver me the bathrobe.... okay... I ask again and just then they got it right.

The stay is pleasant - the room is amazingly quite silent even the location is near the high road.
Love the mirror and lightlnight - the tube is also fine - but if you check the details... you can see that the maintenance was far from okay. You can see the stain of water in the bathroom, dust in the mini bar counter, dust in the lamp area...

If only looking at the room, facilities, utilities - I could give this place full 5 stars (good place/stay for a decent pricetag) but since there is lack here and there that could be avoided by the management... I just have to stop at 3 starts.

Btw there is no basement parking lot for your car - and the parking lot only could fit like 20 cars or so... 

Would recommend this place though if they somehow up the maintenance and services part... way from just a smile to actually doing something for the guest.
title: Could have been better...

text: I stayed here with friends on 9-10 January 2021. Location is good, we walked to abuba steak for dinner. The parking is no hassle, the lobby is ok, the room is nice. Overall I am impressed by the dimmed ligthing almost all around since the lobby.
title: Dimmed Lit Boutique

text: There is no maintenance at all, very dirty sheets, smelly and dusty rooms, and so called breakfast is a plate of “pasta” brought to your room. Who eats plate of cold pasta at brekfast? Even coffee or tea not served with that, forced to use instant coffee powder. Ridiculous. Go ahead and stay if you want to ruin your holiday. A total rip off. A copy paste manager email doesnt make an excuse. 🤣🤣🤣
title: The most broke hotel I have ever seen.

text: My overall experience was ok. I think what most hotels fail to execute this days are the service that exceed guest expectation. Amaroossa is pretty old, but the room is big enough. Their staff were friendly, especially the security and reception. Not in the breakfast resto, there was no service at all, just saw some staff clear up and wipe the tables. Although the room is big, it needs some renovation for the aircon (noisy and need to wait several minutes to be cold enough). Food was ok, pretty complete breakfast selection. The aesthetic and authenticity factor can be improved, to make the hotel shine even its old. Hope this can be received as a constructive feedback for the hotel.
title: Just ok

text:
I was stay for couple nights with my Boyfriend.
We want to lay and used a swiming pool On our 1st day but there is an event at the pool so, we go to coffee shop to had a coffee.
We were order 2 cups of coffee and that takes more than 20mnts for 2 coffee. 
I ordered Cappuccino but he gave me just normal black coffee with cold milk already poured inside. We asked why takes so long for coffee ? They said "because all the staff were busy in swimming pool area".
2nd day we went to the same coffee shop to order 2 cappuccino and still takes 25mnt for 2 cups of cappuccino.
My boyfriend try to extend the room via Reception but the price 2x more expensive than Traveloka, so i suggest booked or reserved the room via online instead.
We Had a massage in the room, actually that was a good massage. Because we don't have any deposit or CC for guaranteed in Front office we need to pay directly to the front desk and i tell her (therapist)  to wait for couple mnts. But the therapist push me to go because she was hungry and need to take a break. I mean like why did you tell the guest that you need to take a break and hungry ? 
For what ?

text:
I stayed there from 1-7 July. The hotel is big and the room is spacious. It came with king sized bed and was comfortable. Toilet and shower room were clean. 
Daily breakfast had a Wide variety of Indonesian dishes. The hotel draws steady flow of local and foreign guests. It has ample parking space in front of the hotel and is well guarded. It has a splash pool within the garden ambience. It looks cosy. The staff are really very friendly and warm. the GM was  very friendly too. the front office staff are really friendly. All of them were fluent in English. Communication is never a problem. I would like to mention, the guest relation staff Ms Tabitha is really outstanding with a very friendly and cheerful nature. She makes her guests feel really at home. Her willingness to help her guest and her warm and friendly smile is an asset to the hotel. There’s no regret booking in to that hotel.
title: My experience

I stayed here for 2 month and it was a great experience. The facilities, location, staffs, interiors, and food are excellent for it's price range. Staff and their service is my takeaway–they're always helpful, jolly, and accommodating.
The only drawbacks for me: it is near a busy street which can be noisy sometimes, it is far off from areas with public transportation options (only taxis are available) and malls/convenience stores/cafes/etc.

text:
Stayed for 2 nights with my parents and a baby. Booked 2 king size bed rooms with a connecting door via their website. But When we arrived, They gave us 1 room king bed and 1 room twin bed with no connecting door. They said they give room based on what available at that time (so, dont bother to book a room type while booking online) they don't care about what we want.

(+) location
(+) Security staff was very nice

(-) room was very dark, dirty linen with blood stain and cigarette butt stain (in a non smoking room), dust in every corner. Not good for family with kids/baby 
(-) breakfast tasted funny. And the staff didn't care to clean up
(-) the pool was very tiny
(-) no sound proofing wall. We can hear people talking in the other room and vehicle noise on the street
title: Dirty dusty and dark hotel

text:
We stay in the Suite room, which cost probably less than half of standard room in other 4-star hotel in Jakarta.. and it was such a great value! Located very near to the Kemang area, where nightlife is almost endless.
The interior was beautifully designed, with a spacious bedroom (bed is a bid small though, I guess?), and the idea of separating toilet with the shower is really great. 
Breakfast is awesome, and the hotel staff was nothing but helpful whenever we need an assistance. 
A bit of minus:
- swimming pool is tiny, for kids only
- no basement parking available

Other than those, all is good. I'd surely spent another night here anytime soon!
title: Probably the best valued hotel in Jakarta!

Room are clean, greatly decorated and cocooning, love it! There is everything I would need from hotel room. Bathroom are very nice and comfy too!

Basically I ll return again as soon as I will need to!

text:
From the exterior, you can see that the hotel is in the luxury category. Having said that, let's see if it does live to its look.

The deluxe room was absolutely spacious. Amenities were fine. Room was clean. Bathroom was also spacious with full view of the room. 

Service was OK but we ran into a bit of a not so good incident where the reception and restaurant kept on pestering us to pay for the food we had at the poolside. We have asked the bill to be put under our room but somehow they misunderstood. If they cant put it under the room, they could have informed me earlier as I stood there waiting for the bill for a good 5 mins or so because they mixed up our order and the bill needed adjustment. Anyway, problem sorted. Probably isolated case. 

Other than that, the stay was pleasant. One comment to note for future traveller, this location has no other close-by shops or activities. Buy whatever stuff you need beforehand, once in the hotel, you will need to walk say abt 500m or so for food or others.
title: Spacious Room

text:
The only thing I didn't like about this hotel was that it is far away from big markets and malls, but that was chosen by my company as it I closer to the work area I had.
I stayed here for 4 nights and really enjoyed my stay as the room was big, very well maintained and thoughtfully decorated. The service was really top class and the response time usually was good. However, on the negative, the day I had to check out was at 12.30 am and I was told that I will get my breakfast packed and delivered when I check out. This was not available at the time of check out.
title: A wonderful experience for hotel located away from big attractions

text:
I stayed at the hotel last week and thought it was really nice, new, clean and breakfast was great. I've stayed at many other hotels in Jakarta for around or under $100US a night and this so far is my favorite. For the price and experience, this was great.
Also the staff was very friendly to follow up with any concerns I had. I look forward to staying there again next time.  Thanks very much.
title: Nice Hotel

text:
This was a sudden stay since our way back home was congested, we decided to check in a near by hotel.

Check In
The lobby was small but since this is a new hotel it gives you a nice scent and smells "new"
The lady at the reception was very nice. I had a flu and i asked whether she has a flu medicine and politely she said yes. She excused her self and went back to her back office and came back with the medicine. I asked for a glass of water and she called one of the waiter and the waiter came back with a glass of water. This is a very good gesture and great customer service

The room
we had the suite room. The room was new so everything was good. all facilities working. The carpet was very thick and it smells nice. It had a bath tub, standing shower and separate room for the toilet bowl. the view was overlooking at the street. we were on 5th floor so the view was not so great. Bed was very nice. overall the room was clean and enjoyable

The breakfast
Next day, we had our breakfast in the restaurant. to my surprise the breakfast was very nice. The indonesian food selection was great and further more the taste is there. I might say this was the best indonesian breakfast i ever had in any hotel i ever stayed. The "Lontong sayur", "soto betawi", "telor balado" and many other was very tasty. The downside was that the selection for western food was not that many but this is understandable considering their target market is mostly indonesian.

The pool and the gym
Pool was small and the gym was ok. the gym equipment is new and for me its enough

overall stay : the stay was ok. the only glitch was my request to have extra towel. I had to call twice and waited for quite some times before they brought the towel
title: Great Indonesian Breakfast and nice room

text:
At the first sight, their room is excellent. Furnishings are amazingly elegant, glamour, and luxury. Very comfy bed, great sofa, and beautiful bathroom. But unfortunately, very poor in cleanliness. I only put some food in the coffee table for 30 minutes, when I got back ants were all over the food. It also happened in electric kettle area. You cannot left any drinks there, ants will fill your drinks. My room also had a bit of cigars odor, I think previous guest did smoking in the room.

Their pool area is very small, so does the gym. No facilities for kids (no playground nor babysitting service), well no surprising since this hotel is not a family hotel though. Small parking area, best not bring your car here. 

Location is great, lots of restaurant around the hotel. Their staffs are friendly and very helpful. Breakfast is also great, delicious with adequate varieties for a 4 star hotel. 

Overall, my stay is pleasant since I only stayed for 1 night, but i would not recommend this hotel for a family holiday nor honeymooners.
title: Luxury hotel and great location

text:
The hotel interior is really beautiful, just like the other Amaroossa Hotel (I stayed in Amaroossa Bandung few times and one time at Bogor). The room is elegantly designed, with the see through bathroom from the bedroom unless the curtain is closed. On top of that the bed was so comfy, and I thought I could have a very good nite sleep.. Unfortunately the noise from the traffic outside was so bad, I had difficulty sleeping because there's always sound of cars speeding up on the flyover..probably they're trying to make a real life scene of "fast and furious". 
Other thumb down is because I found ants on the table... wonder where it came, since my room was on the 5th floor. 
Breakfast was so poor.. the selection was so limited..only 1 kind of fruit available. 
Parking space is also limited.. would be troublesome if they have lots of meeting/venue on the same day.
title: Too close to the "fast and furious" shooting spot

text:
I found this new hotel by accident, because the location is not far from the central office where I work,

Every week me and the team did brain-strorming or entertain clients in the hotel, either the lounge or coffee shop to change the office atmosphere.

They are spacious with a very modern interior, a large bed and a bathroom with rain shower, our guests are very satisfied with this hotel although still relatively new.

Myself and the team really enjoy the setting of the lounge, food, services, interior and cozy atmosphere. Desty, one of the staff lounge were very nice and helpful. Beverage and snacks (spring rolls, pempek and others) on of our favorite snacks they offer.

I believe that with the standard of service and facilities that they offer, this hotel will be one of the favorites choices for accommodation or just hang out in the afternoon time.

    
a little advice to seek alternative parking space especially when full condition.
title: new hotel, very good , meeting

The only downside was the lack of menu for breakfast. This hotel supposed to be 4 star hotel but the menu for breakfast was very limited. Food variety for breakfast should really be added if this hotel wanted to please their consumer. If they do, I will give it 5 star rating, no doubt.

text:
価格で考えるとサービスや部屋の質は普通かと思います。
最近はここの周辺にも安いホテルがあり、そこと比較すると朝食は少し種類が多く、部屋は少し大きいですがビジネスで使用する分にはあまり変わらないと思いました。
また、WIFIの接続があまりよくなくメール送信に時間がかかったので他の周辺の同等のホテルと比較するとWIFIはあまりよくありませんでした。
朝食はローカル向けと言う感じでした。野菜などはあまりありませんでした。
title: 価格は普通、サービスも普通
